Lists or reloads permission list on [[BDS]]. Or sets a player's [[permission level]].

== Syntax ==
:<code>permission list</code>
::Prints the current used permissions list. Exclusive to [[BDS]].
:<code>permission reload</code>
::Makes the [[server]] reload the operator list from the <samp>permissions.json</samp> file. Exclusive to [[BDS]].
:<code>permission set <player: target> [permission: PermissionLevel]</code>
:: Sets a player's permission. Does not exist in [[BDS]]. Normally cannot be executed due to its too high permission level requirement (level 4).

== Arguments ==
{{argument|be=1|player: target|CommandSelector<Player>}}
: {{arg desc|be=player}}

{{argument|be=1|permission: PermissionLevel|enum}}
: Must be one of:
:* <code>member</code>
:* <code>operator</code>
:* <code>visitor</code>
